inclusion.criterion: All patients fulfill the modified International Criteria for Behçet's Disease
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: patients with hyperlipidemia, hypertension, diabetes mellitus and all other risk factors affecting blood vessel intimal thickness
exclusion.label: met

notes: Patient has a history of CAD s/p CABG, EF 60% prior CVA (no residual deficits), HTN, HL, DMII, Moderate to Severe PVD. He underwent Carotid U/S that showed significant bilateral carotid stenosis.
